sections.heading: Overview
content: Kathleen Dowling Singh, PhD, is a former hospice worker, a transpersonal psychologist, and the author of The Grace in Dying: How We Are Transformed Spiritually As We Die . She lectures frequently on the spiritual dimensions of dying and is a frequent contributor to beliefnet.com.
